subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Martin Brodeur stopped 29 shots for his N.H.L.-leading sixth shutout of the season and the 86th of his career, and Brian Rafalski’s unusual goal helped the Devils to a 2-0 victory against the host Islanders last night.
snippet: Martin Brodeur stopped 29 shots for his N.H.L.-leading sixth shutout of the season and the 86th of his career, and Brian Rafalski’s unusual goal helped the Devils to a 2-0 victory against the host Islanders last night.
